body: You can goad an opponent into attacking you in order to make your counter attack all the more powerful.
name: Reverse-Feint
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Orcs/New Racial Rules/Orc Feats/Reverse-Feint

sections.body: As a move action, you can leave a gap in your defenses for one adjacent opponent to use. If the opponent attacks you on its next turn, it gains a +4 bonus on its attack roll. Whether or not the opponent successfully hits, you may attack it as an immediate action with a single melee attack, gaining a +2 bonus on your attack roll.
sections.name: Benefit
